hero.title: Excursion Studio - Products
hero.description: Currently, Excursion Studio has produced Research-related Page Templates Series, including personal homepage templates and research project page templates.

items.title: Excursion Studio Personal Homepage Ver.2 (ESPH-V2)
items.text: A React-based personal homepage template, which is used to show personal career and experiences.

items.title: Excursion Studio Research Project Page (ESRPP)
items.text: A React-based research project page template, which is used to show research project's detailed information.
features: Support for papers, presentations and resources

items.title: Excursion Studio Personal Homepage (ESPH) <z>(Outdated)</z>
items.text: A native JavaScript-based personal homepage template, which is used to show personal career and experiences. Page performance is lower than V2 version, but it is stable and reliable.
